title: OMI_physics_joint Physics Joint Drive
description: Parameters describing a drive or motor which applies forces within a joint.

type.description: Determines the degree of freedom which this drive controls.

anyOf.description: The drive applies a linear force along the driven axis.
The drive applies a torque about the driven axis.
Value computed from the spring equation is the force to apply along the axis.
Value computed from the spring equation is the acceleration to apply along the axis.

axis.description: The index of the axis which this drive applies forces on.

maxForce.description: The maximum force (or torque, for angular drives) the drive can apply. If not provided, this drive is not force-limited.

positionTarget.description: The target translation/angle along the axis that this drive attempts to achieve.

velocityTarget.description: The target velocity along/about the axis that this drive attempts to achieve.

stiffness.description: The stiffness of the drive, scaling the force based on the position target.

damping.description: The damping of the drive, scaling the force based on the velocity target.
